data.description:
A VR Jet Ski game that seamlessly blends simulation and arcade-style gameplay for an unforgettable water racing adventure. 

**> Single-player mode with unique objectives and checkpoints**

**> Multiplayer intense 5-player match**

**> Single-player monster survival matches**


Collect power-ups, and feel the wind in your hair & prepare to be captivated by Aqua Glide's stunning visuals, which bring the thrill of Jet Ski racing to life with unprecedented realism. Every ripple, every splash, and every dynamic water effect is rendered in breathtaking detail, ensuring an immersive experience that will leave you craving for more.

![{"height":320,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75295751_372902772466435_8466621423498208779_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=r9cUqlIQpu8Q7kNvgF8tLO0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=A_XZ4oFjo26HIbpHvX7jjXJ&oh=00_AYBvSOdDHwcyWXzElQqzm8ScuPyGOrln9mRUxEYKsIOC0Q&oe=66E425BC)

![{"height":512,"type":"image","width":2048}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003273_1407373547330444_35689028358658917_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=O6tNzZYMmJcQ7kNvgGM2brM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=A_XZ4oFjo26HIbpHvX7jjXJ&oh=00_AYDTUH0NENuAqughGgxntQRY3GWd4L7axcFbfTASRdlSiA&oe=66E4110B)

{796833135755549}

But Aqua Glide is more than just a thrilling racing game â€“ it's an evolving experience. With regular content updates and seasonal events, you'll always have new challenges to conquer, new environments to explore, and new opportunities to showcase your mastery on the waves.
Get ready to make a splash in the virtual world of Aqua Glide, where the rush of Jet Ski racing meets the cutting-edge power of VR technology. Strap on your headset, rev up your engines, and let the adrenaline-fueled adventure begin!
